name: Paddy Wars
blurb: Join with The Irish Rebellion Of 2013. Ever wanted a game, that\u2019s just fun, funny and scary.Luck will be your reward. NO UBERNERDS!

rewards.reward: You will receive our undying thanks and be among the first to know when the game is released.
Picture Perfect: A signed Picture by the leprechaun himself delivered straight to your inbox and access to our private developers forum. Plus 500 in game coin pack to kickstart you in the game.

The Luck Of The Irish: As well as a signed picture of the famous leprechaun, you will receive the luck of the Irish, straight into your inbox. A digital Certificate of luck will be winging its way to you with this pledge. A limited edition sound track of the game. Plus 500 in game coin pack to kickstart you in the game.

NEW REWARD: All backers at this level will as well as getting your Irish cert of luck and Picture perfect. Will also receive a Secrets map containing in game secrets, shortcuts, hacks and much much more...

See Paddy Everywhere: All of picture perfect plus a one off, limited edition screen savers for your PC and mac.You also get a digital copy of the game and the music. Take it everywhere. Also you get 500 in game coins to kickstart your game.

Your Part Of Our Team!!! 
That's right you get all of the above and you are part of our team. You get
: To be a tester of the game. You will receive it on your smart device. : Part of the forum, you will get a password and a voice in how the finished game will look. 
That's right we want to know what you think about the game and you will have a voice in how the game is shaped. 
So if you ever wanted to become a game developer now is you chance.

Your Part Of The Team: All of the previous rewards: Plus Closed beta access, you will have the game before anyone else. Whats more is you will be part of the team and you can tell us what you like and we will incorporate good ideas into the game. But theres more: You will receive a one off, limited edition smartphone cover. This classic cover will become a collectable. Only for kickstarter.

Team Plus: Be Lucky always with your double the luck coin. On one side the luck of the irish, on the other Leprechaun luck. Now you can carry the luck of the Irish with you always. Plus your name in lights, well so to speak. Have you name listed on credits. Plus all the previous rewards as well.

Artwork in a hat: Limited edition Baseball cap and the artwork of the game. Have paddy look after your head, with an elegant baseball cap to show the world that you believe in leprechauns. Plus all previous rewards.

Wear The Man: All of the rewards from the above pledges. And \r\n: T-shirt only made for kickstarter with Paddy and the banshee. \r\n: A printed calender This will only be made for kickstarter, a magnificent piece of art created just for you for 2014. Look out for the March the 17th of march is Paddy's Day after all.

Wear The man. Be proud of your one off design T-shirt that says Have Your Seen My Leprechaun? another collectable your one off design Tablet cover.  Thats right have the Lucky lep himself protect your favorite tablet. Oh yeah and of course all the previous rewards as well.

We Got You Covered: Get all of the goodies from the rewards above. Plus a Cover for your smartphone. A unique design make especially for the game. Play the game, wear the game, Have the smart phone cover.

Relax Your Covered: All of the previous rewards: Plus a one off design, one time printed, unique, never to be seen again, amazing, stunning, Lucky laptop bag. Thats right stay lucky with this exclusive design laptop bag. Now no matter where you go you can have the game, the luck and the style with you. Plus all previous rewards.

Become Imortal: Want to be evil or good. Be literally part of the game, Send us your picture and you will make a character in the game look like you. Selection of good or evil is on a first come first served basis. So hurry and make sure you get the one you want. \r\nBut theres more name a road, we will erect a road sign on one of the paths with your name on it. Of course you get all the great previous rewards as well.

Be an Executive producer: All of the previous rewards, except, hat, teeshirt, smart phone cover, tablet cover are all  a unique design, so secret we cannot show them here. But they will never be seen again. But theres more, your will be listed at the top of the credits as one of the producers of the game. But there is more again. You will have a vote on the final cut of the game, so you will be able to say I MADE THIS!. You will also be part of the insiders?insiders forum. You will receive the game 3 days before anyone else in beta and receive the game digitally on all devices, one week before everyone else and have a map to the secret levels and treasures.

The Mystery box: This is so cool we cannot every talk about it. You get all of the above. But so much more. All we can say, is if you can travel (you will have to buy plane ticket) This will blow your mind...
